title: What is the average laptop size? - Quora

response.answer_text: 13 1/2″ by 9 1/2″ by 1″. However, newer laptops are slimmer and hybrids like the Surface are both smaller and about 1/2″ thin. I think the Surface is the best choice. Small, thin, fast and full featured. As for regular laptops, Dell, Lenovo, Toshiba are good choices.
